alert.note: Alert for Gadsden; Inland Jefferson; Inland Wakulla; Leon (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 24 at 5:47PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Wakulla, eastern Gadsden, southwestern Jefferson, Leon, southeastern Decatur and southern Grady Counties through 630 PM EDT... At 546 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles southwest of Cairo, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Midway, Woodville, Tallahassee, Havana, Florida State University, Florida A And M, Tallahassee Comm College, Doak Campbell Stadium, Wakulla, Lake Bradford, Cody, Leon Sinks, Gaither Community Center, Wakulla Springs, Tallahassee Memorial Hosp, Florence, Jamieson, Rocky Hill, Iamonia and Eight Mile Pond. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Gadsden; Inland Jefferson; Inland Wakulla; Leon
